data.name: My Furry Dictator üêæ
data.detailed_description:
Wishlist our new game:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1928840/My_Dragon_Party/


About the Game

Wishlist our new game My Furry Dragon:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1818370/My_Furry_Dragon/

Your life is a true success story - you have achieved your dreams, becames rich and got everything you've ever wanted. There is nothing that you can't buy now. But why can't you feel happy? Is this what you wanted?... Everything changes when your personal plane crashes in the ocean and you find yourself on an unknown island, which changes your life completly in the next few days.

My Furry Dictator is a short visual novel about love, succes, goals and happines. Our heroes are completly different but feel the same emotions, have the same thoughts. Maybe political views don't matter so much, maybe this is a chance for them to find their love? Find it yourself in "My Furry Dictator"!

Features:

‚Ä¢ Fascinating story with romance and comedy elements.
‚Ä¢ HD fully original artworks.
‚Ä¢ 2 hours of content.
‚Ä¢ Relaxing atmosphere.
‚Ä¢ Hot dictator!

data.short_description: Wake up, comrade, you arrived to the best country in the world! We have socialism, paws and most importantly - a hot dictator. Experience the story of a young billionare and his relationship with the most insane woman in his life!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: anything from this millenium
  • Graphics: 2 GB RAM
  • Sound Card: potato

content_descriptors.notes: This visual novel contains mentions of alcohol consumption, sexual themes and dialogue.
